name: Sange
description:
Sange is a 2D platformer stealth game with action components. It is set in a fantasy dark world in which the player takes the role of a lady vampire with supernatural power.

Story driven game in which the player personify Sange, a lady vampire who, despite science and biology, was able to give birth to a baby. Once the church found out about the baby, they gathered an armed force to take down the family. The vampires protected the village for centuries, but a prophecy changed things. 

Game Engine is completely written by the team, Gentle Maniac, who is asked to to build the game from bottom up.

Art is all made in house by the three artists from the team. Sprite, animations and VFX have all been made according to the dark-fantasy atmosphere of the story.
